name: Down the Mountain
description:
Note: try to avoid pressing the Window Size buttons on the web version, it does weird stuff lol. There is a button on the bottom right on web to go fullscreen.

I've been hard at work for the last week making a roguelike, and here it is! "Down the Mountain" is very short, you only need to make it through three monster-infested levels to reach the end, so I hope you give it a go! :)

Controls are shown on the game's start screen, but I'll repeat them here briefly:

Numpad 123456789 or QWEASDZXC or HJKLYUBN. keys to move

Space or Enter (Return) or Numpad Enter to pick up items and descend stairs

Tab or I or Numpad + to open the inventory
